AI/Data: Artifact shows data retrieval or quick viz; accepts Colab/Gist link or PNG.
Dev: Artifact shows code run or transaction; accepts GitHub/Gist link, Codespace URL, or tx hash screenshot.
Design: Artifact shows a small UI tweak or banner; accepts PNG/JPG link or upload.
Growth: Artifact shows copy or plan; accepts tweet/linkedin post link or doc link.
